IMPECCABLE STYLE, UNQUESTIONABLE QUALITY!
Designed and built to an exacting standard on a fully-landscaped 670sqm (approx.) lifestyle block, this state-of-the-art Henley-built residence was never intended to be sold. You're also within walk-in distance to Berwick Waters Lake, plus a number of public and private schools including Waverley Christian College, St Frances Xavier College, Hillcrest College, Alkira and Tulliallan primary school, Federation University and Nossal College.
